message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period based on the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item, which represents the cost of inventory that was sold during the period. This is the value I need to extract.

From the income statement:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 3175000.00

This is the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3175000.00'} }
```
